alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 3:41PM CST until February 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville, Flat Woods...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected to continue. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water inundates low lying areas and agricultural land along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 10.1 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to remain steady and crest tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 945 AM CST.
